paintings.descr: All creatures (from the great blue whale down to the tiny ant) on this earth have to work to live. These tiny ants are working around their home.

paintings.medium: Mixed Media ( Water Soluble Pastels, Acrylic Ink, Acrylic Paint, Oil Paint) on Watercolor Paper
paintings.descr: With Springs comes the apple blossoms.
The ants are busy at their farm. They have a lot of work to do and don't have time to stop and talk to us.
Even the most gental flower can have a dark side.
The colors dance around this black rose.

paintings.medium: Mixed Media ( Water Soluble Pastels, Acrylic Ink, Acrylic Paint, Oil Paint) on Watercolor Paper
paintings.descr: During the summer we are given the privilege of smelling the chrysanthemums. In this image we see a group of chrysanthemum flower and insects against an abstract background.

paintings.medium: Mixed Media ( Water Soluble Pastels, Acrylic Ink, Acrylic Paint, Oil Paint) on Watercolor Paper
paintings.descr: If we listen to the songs in our heart, we will dance to it. In this image we see a girl dancing with a ribbon to the song in her heart.
As we watch the gental fire that lies within every living being.
Water towers are often used to collect stores of water. What if instead of collecting water, it were to collect nectar. In this image we explore the possibility of a Nectar Source.
